title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Using Alexa For Fast Researching on the Internet
description: A tip sheet on using the Alexa web utility for journalistic research, including real-time site ownership information, linked listings of similar sites, web traffic rankings, and access to the Wayback Machine.
